channel.title: nullability on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in nullability on Fresh Swift

item.title: nil-null-mess in Objective-C and Swift
item.description: In this post, Andy Ibanez looks at the state of nullability in both Objective-C and Swift. Andy explains the different representations of nothingness in each language and points out some pitfalls which we might encounter when working with nullability.
